trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides access to information on a drive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides access to information on the specified drive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A valid drive path or drive letter.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxx xxxxx xxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: This can be either uppercase or lowercase, 'a' to 'z'.
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx$ $x$ xx $x$.

trans-unit.source: A null value is not valid.
trans-unit.target: X xxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The drive letter cannot be null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
The first letter of driveName is not an uppercase or lowercase letter from 'a' to 'z'.

-or-

driveName does not refer to a valid drive.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxxXxxx$$xx$ xx xxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx $x$ xx $x$.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxXxxx$$xx$ xxxx xxx xxxxx xx x xxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Indicates the amount of available free space on a drive, in bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xx x xxxxx$ xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The amount of free space available on the drive, in bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx$ xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Access to the drive information is denied.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An I/O error occurred (for example, a disk error or a drive was not ready).
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx X$X xxxxx xxxxxxxx $xxx xxxxxxx$ x xxxx xxxxx xx x xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the name of the file system, such as NTFS or FAT32.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx$ xxxx xx XXXX xx XXX00.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the file system on the specified drive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Access to the drive information is denied.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The drive does not exist or is not mapped.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxx xx xx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An I/O error occurred (for example, a disk error or a drive was not ready).
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx X$X xxxxx xxxxxxxx $xxx xxxxxxx$ x xxxx xxxxx xx x xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the drive type, such as CD-ROM, removable, network, or fixed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxx$ xxxx xx XX$XXX$ xxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxx$ xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

One of the enumeration values that specifies a drive type.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx x xxxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value that indicates whether a drive is ready.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx x xxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the drive is ready; false if the drive is not ready.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the drive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the root directory of a drive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object that contains the root directory of the drive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the total amount of free space available on a drive, in bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxx$ xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The total free space available on a drive, in bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx x xxxxx$ xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Access to the drive information is denied.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The drive is not mapped or does not exist.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An I/O error occurred (for example, a disk error or a drive was not ready).
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx X$X xxxxx xxxxxxxx $xxx xxxxxxx$ x xxxx xxxxx xx x xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the total size of storage space on a drive, in bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx x xxxxx$ xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The total size of the drive, in bytes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx$ xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Access to the drive information is denied.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The drive is not mapped or does not exist.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

An I/O error occurred (for example, a disk error or a drive was not ready).
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx X$X xxxxx xxxxxxxx $xxx xxxxxxx$ x xxxx xxxxx xx x xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the volume label of a drive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxx xx x xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The volume label.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An I/O error occurred (for example, a disk error or a drive was not ready).
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx X$X xxxxx xxxxxxxx $xxx xxxxxxx$ x xxxx xxxxx xx x xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The drive is not mapped or does not exist.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The volume label is being set on a network or CD-ROM drive.

-or-

Access to the drive information is denied.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xx x xxxxxxx xx XX$XXX xxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$Xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Retrieves the drive names of all logical drives on a computer.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An I/O error occurred (for example, a disk error or a drive was not ready).
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx X$X xxxxx xxxxxxxx $xxx xxxxxxx$ x xxxx xxxxx xx x xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx$.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns a drive name as a string.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxx xxxx xx x xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the drive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x
